title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2430.7 - Fees and copies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2430.7 - Fees and copies

State Regulations
(a) There shall
be no fee charged for: (1)
inspection of
records; (2)
search for records; or
(3)
any certification issued
pursuant to this Part. (b) Photocopies of records will be made upon
request and payment of a fee of 15 cents per page of photocopy. (c) The records access officer shall, upon
request, certify that photocopies of records are true copies of the records
copied. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2430.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
